attributes.additional_details:
The BAC/Aerospatiale Concorde was a supersonic commercial airliner serving with British Airways and Air France between 1976 and 2003. The main reason for retirement was politics; hence why i'm trying to get it to fly again via politics. There are many reasons as to why she should fly again, including:

- It's supersonic, thus it can 'skip' time zones, making flights a lot quicker. Businessmen/women can benefit largely from this.
-It is an extremely popular with celebrities and aviation enthusiasts. People will pay lots of money to fly on this, consequently making profit, eventually.
-Efficient way of making income.
 And many more reasons.

We need to Government to provide funding and awareness of this project.

What we as citizens can do -

Donate money.

What I can do-

Make enquirys about possible extra funding and components (Rolls Royce- Engines, and Maintenance).

Thank you, from a 14 year old  year old with a dream. To make her fly again!
